scripts.bump:internal: npm version $version_type && VERSION=$(npm pkg get version --workspaces=false | sed 's/\"//g'); sed -i '' -e "s/^VITE_APP_VERSION=.*/VITE_APP_VERSION=$VERSION/" .env
scripts.confirm-new-version: echo 'Press enter to confirm new version has been created.' && read whatever
scripts.deploy: npm run confirm-new-version && npm run build && firebase deploy --only hosting
scripts.sync: cd cli && npm exec tsc && ./bin/run.js pull && ./bin/run.js push /Users/dogatech/Drive/music/db
scripts.datatypes: npx supabase gen types --lang=typescript --project-id $(grep '^SUPABASE_PROJECT_ID' .env | cut -d '=' -f2) --schema public > src/database.types.ts
